paper_abstract: In this short correspondence, (1 + uv)-constacyclic codes over the finite non-chain ring R[v]/(v(2) + v) are investigated, where R = F-2+ uF(2) with u(2) = 0. Some structural properties of this class of constacyclic codes are studied. Further, some optimal binary linear codes are obtained from these constacyclic codes.
paper_title: Linear Codes and (1+uv)-Constacyclic Codes over R[v]/(v(2) + v)
